:span.description: The number of columns occupied by the raster

:offset.description: The number of spaced grids to the left of the grid

:push.description: The grid moves the number of tiles to the right

:pull.description: The grid moves the number of tiles to the left

:xs.description: < 768px responsive raster count or raster attribute object
:xs.description_zh: <768px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象

:sm.description: ≥ 768px responsive raster count or raster attribute object
:sm.description_zh: ≥768px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象

:md.description: ≥ 992px number of responsive rasters or raster attribute objects
:md.description_zh: ≥992px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象

:lg.description: ≥ 1200px number of responsive rasters or raster attribute objects
:lg.description_zh: ≥1200px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象

:xl.description: ≥ 1920px responsive raster count or raster attribute object
:xl.description_zh: ≥1920px 响应式栅格数或者栅格属性对象
